com.snamp.adapters

Class SnmpAdapterBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.snmp4j.agent.BaseAgent
      • com.snamp.adapters.SnmpAdapterBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, Aggregator, PlatformPlugin, PlatformService, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, net.xeoh.plugins.base.Plugin

    public abstract class SnmpAdapterBase
extends org.snmp4j.agent.BaseAgent
implements Adapter
    Represents a base class for SNMP adapter.
